pages.title: Phase 3 Indicators
pages.text: Visual anomalies begin: distant silhouettes, impossible reflections, subtle camera disturbance, and breathing effects. Avoid overreacting to single-frame sightings; rely on repeat observations and known safe routes.

pages.title: Phase 4 Indicators
pages.text: Direct world interference appears. Doors shift, crops uproot, tunnels or terrain changes emerge, and biome boundaries destabilize. Consolidate valuables and prepare a secondary shelter at least one day travel away.
